name: Crypt Of Bethresan
description:
Crypt Of Bethresan

A Rogue-Lite about diving into the Crypt of Bethresan, The summoner. Gathering power-ups to become strong enough to take him down and cleanse the crypt from his minions.

There are 3 levels to complete,

10 Powerups to combine

And 3 bosses to kill.


Thanks for playing. This is my first game, and feedback is much appreciated.
Would also love to know if you got a favorite powerup.
